content.html:
@faller,

Thanks for your feedback. We'll expand pull request #125 to remove any redundant throttling in ros plugins where applicable.

On the topic of required framerates for VO, we are going to implement a couple of default modes to the imager resolution and frame rates per @thomasko suggestion in pull request #115, and will keep your suggestion in mind when doing so. Any additional data points or requirements are welcome.
